urls.title: Jobs at IndiGo
urls.description: It’s time to recruit smart. Param's recruiting software helps automate tedious, repetitive manual tasks like resume screening. It equips recruiters with the means to efficiently cater to increasingly complex recruiting deliverables.

data.text: @TCgian1 Mr Singh, we are also excited to have you onboard with us and request you to visit https://t.co/8fSuAVmTj7 to check and apply for the jobs in IndiGo. Wishing you all the best. 👍 ~Navi
@SanjeevBhirani Sir, thank you for your appreciation. Hope to see you soon onboard.~ Nandita #GoIndiGo
@Moulikshah1009 Hi, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ashishpareek Thanks for the #Shoutout, Mr Pareek. We are elated to note your glowing review at the airport and look forward to having you onboard soon again. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi

@bariana_ps Mr Bariana, we regret the inconvenience and are checking on this with our Concerned Teams. Please allow us some time for the same and you may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@sumitch41775971 Mr Chaudhary, the same is acknowledged and our Airport Team will be there to assist the customers. Do let us know via DM in case more assistance is required. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ramjithr6 Hi, please share the PNR along with your contact number via DM so we can assist at the earliest. Thanks. ~Ojasvi

@VasuDev78309478 Sir, we tried calling you multiple times, however, couldn't connect. Please share an alternate number along with a suitable time to speak via DM so we may speak with you in this regard. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@IndiGo6E Rest, we suggest you delete the tweet you posted with your PNR code as it contains Personal Information. (2/2) ~Navi

data.text: @lovleen90 Mr Manchanda, we are here to assist you and request you to DM us the Image of your Wallet ( if possible ) along with the place, where it is left. Thanks. (1/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Aditi0385 Ms Nayak, we regret the inconvenience and are checking on this with the Concerned Team. You may also get in touch with our Airport Team for any real-time assistance on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@junaidhk42 Mr Khan, unfortunately, Vape is also not allowed to be carried in the Hand/ Check-In Luggage. ~Navi

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text:
@IN_abhijeet08 Sir, we regret to see this. Please share the complaint acknowledgment copy (PIR) issued by our customer service team at the arrival airport for us to take a closer look and assist you.~ Nandita 
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@teetojaam Hi, we regret the long wait and request you to DM us your PNR or Reference Number of the mail, so we may check on the same and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Raghuserj Sir, our staff always try to accept passengers reporting marginally late, however, keeping in mind the nature of our operations, it is not always possible for us to accept passengers reporting after counter/boarding gate closure. We request your understanding on the same. ~Navi
@vijayant141187 Sir, as checked, the refund has been processed to the primary mode of payment. Please visit https://t.co/m513NExTLu to track your refund status. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@Shailendra2523 Mr Kumar, we understand your concern and request you to DM us your PNR so we may check on the same and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@pawanakumar1968 Mr Kumar, sorry for such an unpleasant experience. We have been taking all the necessary steps to control mosquitoes and only allow passengers to board once the fumigation is done. We'll make sure to pass on your feedback and wish you a great day. ~Navi

urls.title: How to Check-in | Print Boarding Pass - IndiGo
urls.description: IndiGo offers you multiple check-in options. Save time by online check-in or using the IndiGo mobile app. You can also download & print boarding pass online.

data.text: @kumarakshay1 Sir, please visit https://t.co/58PvLAYAOv to complete the Web Check-In and to generate the Boarding Passes. Please don't change the assigned seats and let us know via DM in case you face any issues. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@haripittar Hi, please share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita
@AparnaSylaja Hi, we regret the late response due to the high volume of mentions. We hope to provide you with a more timely resolution in the future.~ Nandita

@darpanseth Thanks for the #Shoutout, Mr Seth. We are happy to know that you had a #6E Check-In Experience with us. We'll have your appreciation shared with Kishor and wish you a comfortable time in the skies. 💙 #goIndiGo ~Navi
@Soumya976957 Ma'am, we understand your concern and request you to inform the customers to contact our Bengaluru Airport Team for any real-time assistance. Thanks. ~Navi
@6d2ed24510e0473 Hi, please share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Rdcoolgarg143 Hi, we believe our customer relations team is in touch with you. We request you to revert to the same trailing mail for further assistance.~ Nandita
@PriyankaJ1993 Hi, we believe our customer relations team is in touch with you. We request you to revert to the same trailing mail for further assistance.~ Nandita

@rkmaurya Sir, while doing the web check-in, instead of the 'select seat' option, please click on the 'auto-assign' option which is available 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Ojasvi
@dibasbiswas Mr Biswas, apologies for the typo. You can carry a 30000 mAh Power Bank in your Hand Luggage for both Domestic and International flights. ~Navi
@mousumid0 Ms Das, we are checking on this and will try to get back to you with an update, ASAP. Requesting your patience on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@akash1701 Mr Shrivastava, we regret the experience and are checking on this with our Concerned Team. Please allow us some time for the same and you may also DM us for further communication. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@gargvive Mr Garg, please share your contact details via DM so we can assist you at the earliest. Thanks. ~Ojasvi
@UshasunilSunil Ms Sunil, we are here to assist you and request you to DM us your PNR and concern in detail so we may check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@dibasbiswas Mr Biswas, you can carry a 3000 mAh Power Bank in your Hand Luggage for both Domestic and International flights. ~Navi
@iamDibakar86 Mr Dey, you can carry the Trimmer with a Non-Removable Battery in your Hand Luggage. ~Navi
@faizanchhipa56 Hi, the weight of ZamZam Water is included in your Checked-In Baggage allowance. ~Navi

@vamankulkarni11 Sir, we regret the experience. We do understand rude behaviour is not acceptable. Further, we are getting this checked with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita
@mousumid0 Hi, this concerns us. We'd like to take a look into this right away. Please help us with the passenger's PNR via DM so we can check and assist. ~Ojasvi
@mohanla41445703 Rest, we suggest you delete the tweet you posted with your PNR Code as it contains Personal Information. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi

urls.description: It’s time to recruit smart. Param's recruiting software helps automate tedious, repetitive manual tasks like resume screening. It equips recruiters with the means to efficiently cater to increasingly complex recruiting deliverables.

data.text: @Lokesh80097199 Hi, we request you to visit https://t.co/8fSuAV5Qh7 to check and apply for the jobs in IndiGo. Wishing you all the best. 👍 ~Navi
@_Iam_BISHNU Mr Dey, we have replied to your DM and request you to kindly check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi

@docaseem We regret the inconvenience. Please know, to ensure complete security, the ids are checked at the boarding gates. We have duly noted your feedback and shall share the same with the concerned team. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@sachinpanghal Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get this checked. We will update you. ~Ojasvi

@sa70fca Ms Arora, we regret the inconvenience. We have noted your feedback and the same will be shared with our Concerned Team for further review. Looking forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. Thanks. ~Navi
@skkahali Sir, as checked, the refund has been processed to the primary mode of payment on the 22nd of October, 2022. Please visit https://t.co/m513NEgiTW to track your refund status. ~Ojasvi
@hematologydr Sir, don't be worried as we are here to assist you. Please DM us the PNR so we may look into this. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@sachinpanghal Mr Panghal, this doesn't look right to us. Please help us with your PNR as well as a copy of your PIR issued by the arrival airport via DM so we may look into it. ~Ojasvi

@manjunathave Mr Venkatesh, our check-in counters close 60 minutes prior to the time of scheduled departure after which, our team cannot accommodate you on the same flight. We look forward to your understanding. ~Yashica
@KunalS11084 Mr Sharma, we request you to share you PNR with us via DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF so we can assist you. ~Yashica

@_Iam_BISHNU @DGCAIndia @aaikolairport Mr Dey, will it be possible for you to share your PNR as well as PIR with us over DM https://t.co/6ACanKRihF so we can look into this further and assist you? ~Yashica

@animeshsinha8 Thank you for your kind words, Mr Sinha. We would surely convey your compliments to our teammate and look forward to keep serving all our customers with the same zeal. ~Yashica 

#GoIndiGo
@nauticalmiless Mr Mishra, we regret your recent travel experience and request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can raise this with our team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rajuniforms We regret the inconvenience caused. Allow us some time to get it checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@3psatish Sir, our team is expanding new routes rapidly. We shall share your feedback to the concerned team. Stay tuned. ~Diyashi
@raunakam Sir, we never want our passengers to experience any trouble with us. We request you to DM us your PNR so we can check. ~Rahul  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Nidsavaliya25 We regret to hear this. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
Ready to take off, daily and non-stop. That's our ninjas on board. #goIndiGo https://t.co/2YkPdaT8Kt

@doctorwhoswims Ms Solanki, we understand your concern. Please know checked-in baggage weighing more than 15kgs and hand baggage weighing more than 7kgs is chargeable. We look forward for your understanding. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@Rahulbhasins We shall highlight your feedback with the concerned team, looking forward to welcoming you on board for a better experience. (2/2). ~Diyashi

@Rahulbhasins Sir, we regret to see this. We understand spotting insects can be very upsetting, and we take such issues very seriously. Please know we fumigate our every flight before departure. (1/2)

@sreesuvarna Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused. Could you please share your transaction details along with your registered email id and contact number via DM. So we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@HEMPRASADUPADH2 Hello Mr Upadhyay, we are expanding and adding new routes to our network. Please know we have noted your feedback and will be shared with the concerned team. Stay tuned. ~Diyashi
@aksy1 Sir, it was never our intention to cause hassle. We believe our airport staff assisted you with an alternate options. We really hope to serve you well in the future. ~Rahul

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @gargvive We regret the inconvenience, Mr Garg. You may avail Plan B for alternate flight options with no extra charges or full refund by clicking on https://t.co/1huoYGsD9Q. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Dangerous Goods, Things not allowed in flight | IndiGo
urls.description: Visit this page to know about which items are prohibited in checked and cabin baggage and what not? Get all information about our dangerous goods policy.

data.text: @prashantchauha_ Mr Chauhan, we request you to complete your web check-in using https://t.co/lTohySkit1 link. Meanwhile, please share your mobile number over DM with us so we can raise this with our concerned team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@keepkwizing We regret to hear this. Allow us some time to get this checked and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@lolla_47 Sir, we would like to look into this further and request you to DM us a copy of the PIR (property irregularity report) issued by the arrival airport so we may assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@sweety2193 Meanwhile, please DM us all the medical documents duly stamped & signed by the treating doctor along with a proof of relationship between both the customers so we can check & assist you further. ~Linda (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @sweety2193 Ms Kushwaha, wishing your Father a speedy recovery. Please visit https://t.co/o3oJduc8JG to make changes to the booking up to 2 hrs prior to the departure. (1/2)

@infinity9191 Hi, purchasing seat is optional. You can always opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda

@RJSundesha However, such damage can occur during loading & offloading of the baggage at several points like baggage sorting area, baggage belt, baggage trolley & aircraft baggage hold. We will share your feedback with the baggage handling team to be more careful. ~Linda (2/2)

@RJSundesha Mr Sundesha, we regret the experience. Our airport team tried to assist you in the best possible way. Please know we always to try to deliver passengers' baggage in the same condition as we have received them at the time of check-in. (1/2)

@raunakam Mr Maheshwari, please be informed check-in counter closes 60 mins & boarding gate 25 mins prior to the departure. Reporting beyond the closure time can lead to boarding denial. Further, we'd request you to contact our airport team for next available flight. ~Linda

@kaushikthinks Mr Ghosh, you can carry the same in cabin baggage. However, it is subject to further search & clearance by the airport security/CISF. ~Linda
@bhawna39200997 Ms Rajput, there are no extra charges for retrieving boarding pass from the airport check-in counter. ~Linda

data.text: @srimoyeeghoshal Ms Ghoshal, in domestic sector you may carry 1 piece of check-in baggage of 15 kilos. Anything above & beyond will incur extra cost. ~Linda
@kaushikthinks Mr Ghosh, you can carry in both. However, please remove the battery (if any) before placing it in check-in baggage. ~Linda
@SiddiquiVakar Mr Siddiqui, we'd request you to DM us your concern in detail along with the PNR. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SagnikMazumder4 Mr Mazumder, please visit https://t.co/gOAeGTEVUg to know more. ~Linda
@thisisethanhunt Hi, if it is electrically powered, it can be carried in check-in baggage. Please ensure proper packing. ~Linda
